properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: 'jwt.secret' is the secret key of the JWT token generator that this application is using.

properties.name: angular.url
properties.description: 'angular.url' is the url address exposed by the front-end client.

properties.name: mysql.port
properties.description: 'mysql.port' is the port exposed by the MySQL database.

properties.name: email.username
properties.description: 'email.username' is the address of the email box which will send emails to users.

properties.name: email.password
properties.description: 'email.password' is the password of the email box which will send emails to users.
